text: The 1852 United States presidential election in Louisiana took place on November 2, 1852, as part of the 1852 United States presidential election. Voters chose six representatives, or electors to the Electoral College, who voted for President and Vice President. Louisiana voted for the Democratic candidate, Franklin Pierce, over Whig candidate Winfield Scott. Pierce won Louisiana by a margin of 3.88%. ==Results== ==References== Louisiana 1852 Category:1852 Louisiana elections
title: 1852 United States presidential election in Louisiana
